docs.title: Debrid Wiki
docs.text: A navigable home for the notes in this vault. Follow the sections below to jump directly to the source markdown files.

docs.title: Stremio
docs.text:
• Stremio overview — alternative players and a TorBox Reddit thread.
  • Addon catalog — index of addon notes.
  • AIOMetadata and the Yeb’s instance.
  • Debridio — streaming addon manifest and IPTV playlist links.
  • Streailers — trailers inside Stremio.

docs.title: TorBox
docs.text: • Team and roles — who runs infrastructure, support, and social channels.

docs.title: StreamThru
docs.text:
• Manifests — store and torz manifest URLs.
  • Export config — saved list token.

docs.title: Riven
docs.text: • Automation — list watcher/downloader info and generator link.

docs.title: Szene / Usenet
docs.text:
• Szene NZB sources — alternative finders.
  • NzbFlix note — Discord reference and image embed.

docs.title: IPTV dumps
docs.text: • IPTV credentials — assorted public IPTV URLs and logins.

docs.title: Misc
docs.text:
• Welcome note — default Obsidian welcome text.
  • Link test — placeholder for Obsidian linking.

docs.title: Welcome
docs.text:
This is your new vault.

Make a note of something, [[create a link]], or try the Importer!

When you're ready, delete this note and make the vault your own.

docs.title: Streailers
docs.text: Watch movie and TV series trailers in your language directly within [[Stremio]]!

docs.title: Stremio Addons
docs.text:
Quick links to addon notes stored in this vault. Use the Dataview table below (in Obsidian) or the direct links underneath.

![[Stremio-Addons.base]]

  • AIOMetadata — metadata helper with a Yeb’s-hosted instance.
  • Debridio — streaming addon manifest and IPTV playlist.
  • Streailers — trailers inside Stremio with localization.

docs.title: Yeb’s AIOM
docs.text: URL: https://aiometadatafortheweak.nhyira.dev/configure/ - Comment: less restriction on max catalogs/lists
